metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for young professional teacher character
metadata.age_appropriate_note: All scenes are appropriate for children ages 5-12 and ESL learners

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Bedroom
scenes.lighting: dark room, faint gray light at window edges, alarm clock red glow
scenes.camera_view: wide shot of bedroom from doorway
scenes.description: A 28-year-old Colombian woman with light olive skin and dark brown shoulder-length hair sleeps on the left side of a queen bed with white and mint green bedding. Her thin black rectangular glasses sit folded on the wooden nightstand beside a stack of novels and a reading lamp. A digital alarm clock glows 5:30 in red numbers. Her partner sleeps on the right side. A ceiling fan turns slowly overhead. Through the window, the faint outline of Bucaramanga's hills is visible. A small potted fern sits on the windowsill.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown shoulder-length hair sleeping in queen bed, white and mint green bedding, wooden nightstand with reading lamp and novels, digital alarm clock glowing red 5:30, thin black rectangular glasses folded on nightstand, partner sleeping beside her, ceiling fan overhead, window showing faint Bucaramanga hills, potted fern on windowsill, peaceful pre-dawn bedroom, modern apartment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, dark skin, blonde hair, no glasses on nightstand, messy room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Reaching for Glasses
scenes.description: Lucia reaches to the nightstand and picks up her thin black rectangular glasses, unfolding them carefully. She slides them onto her face, the dark frames settling on the bridge of her nose. Her small gold stud earrings catch the faint light. The stack of novels, the reading lamp, and the alarm clock are within arm's reach. She wears a floral pajama top, slightly rumpled.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown messy shoulder-length hair, reaching for thin black rectangular glasses on wooden nightstand, putting glasses on face, wearing floral pajama top, small gold stud earrings, stack of novels and reading lamp on nightstand, alarm clock nearby, faint morning light, waking up, modern apartment bedroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, already wearing glasses, bright room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Checking Reflection
scenes.description: Lucia checks her full appearance in the vanity mirror. Light blue blouse, black pants, black flats, green lanyard with school ID badge, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, small gold stud earrings, light makeup. Morning light warms the room. The Bucaramanga hills are visible through the window, green slopes touched with early gold. The potted fern on the windowsill glows in the new light.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, small gold stud earrings, wearing light blue blouse and black pants, school ID badge on green lanyard, checking reflection in vanity mirror, adjusting collar, morning golden light through window, Bucaramanga green hills visible, potted fern on windowsill, modern apartment bedroom, ready for work as teacher
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, hair down, no glasses, pajamas, dark room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Reading in Bed
scenes.description: Lucia sits propped up in bed against two pillows, the reading lamp casting a warm circle of light. She holds her novel open. Her thin black glasses sit on her face. Her floral pajama top is cozy. She reads intently. The overhead light is off. The ceiling fan creates a gentle breeze. The digital alarm clock glows red: 9:05. The rest of the room is in soft shadow.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown shoulder-length hair loose, thin black rectangular glasses, wearing floral pajama top, sitting propped up in bed reading novel, warm reading lamp glow, white and mint green bedding, digital alarm clock showing 9:05 PM, ceiling fan above, rest of room in soft shadow, cozy evening reading, peaceful bedtime routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, bright room, overhead light on, no glasses, inappropriate

scenes.title: Making the Bed
scenes.description: Lucia stands on her side of the bed, pulling the white and mint green bedding up and smoothing it flat. She tucks the edge under the pillow, then fluffs the pillow. The bed transforms from a rumpled sleeping place to a neatly made surface. The mint green accents are bright against the white. The reading lamp and novels are tidy on the nightstand. The room looks fresh.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, wearing light blue blouse and black pants, making queen bed, pulling up white and mint green bedding, smoothing blanket flat, fluffing pillow, tidy nightstand with reading lamp and novels, morning light, modern apartment bedroom, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, messy bed, pajamas, dark room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Washing Face
scenes.description: Lucia stands at the sink, her thin black glasses set aside on the counter next to the glasses case. She cups water in both hands from the running faucet and splashes it onto her face. Water drips from her chin and cheeks. Her eyes are closed, dark brown hair pushed back from her forehead. The mirror reflects her face and the bright bathroom light. The hand soap dispenser stands beside the faucet.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown shoulder-length hair pushed back, no glasses (glasses on counter), splashing water on face at bathroom sink, cupping water in hands, eyes closed, water dripping from face, bright overhead bathroom light, mirror reflection, hand soap dispenser, glasses case on counter, morning bathroom routine, clean modern bathroom
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, wearing glasses, dark bathroom, inappropriate

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Lucia brushes her teeth, the purple toothbrush moving back and forth in her mouth. White foam gathers at the corners of her lips. She watches her reflection in the mirror, her thin black glasses slightly foggy from her breath. She holds the toothbrush with her right hand, her left hand resting on the edge of the counter. Her floral pajama top is visible in the mirror. The faucet runs a thin stream of water.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown shoulder-length hair, thin black rectangular glasses slightly foggy, brushing teeth with purple toothbrush, white foam at mouth corners, watching reflection in bathroom mirror, wearing floral pajama top, faucet running thin stream of water, bright overhead bathroom light, two toothbrushes in cup (purple and blue), morning hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, no glasses, dark bathroom, inappropriate

scenes.title: Hair in Ponytail
scenes.description: Lucia examines her ponytail in the mirror, turning her head left and right. The dark brown hair is gathered neatly at the back of her head with a black elastic band. A few shorter strands fall near her temples. She smooths them back with her fingers. Her thin black rectangular glasses frame her brown eyes. Her small gold stud earrings are now more visible with her hair pulled back.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown hair in neat ponytail with black elastic band, examining ponytail in bathroom mirror, turning head, smoothing loose strands near temples, thin black rectangular glasses, small gold stud earrings visible, bright bathroom light, basket of hair ties on counter, preparing for work, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, hair down, no glasses, dark bathroom, inappropriate

scenes.title: Applying Light Makeup
scenes.description: Lucia opens her small makeup bag on the counter and pulls out a compact of pressed powder. She opens the compact, looks in its small mirror, and applies a light dusting of powder across her nose and cheeks with a round sponge pad. The makeup is subtle, just evening out her skin tone. The makeup bag also holds a tube of lip balm and a mascara wand. She works quickly and efficiently.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, applying light pressed powder to face with round sponge pad, small makeup compact open on bathroom counter, makeup bag with lip balm and mascara visible, looking in mirror, subtle professional makeup, bright bathroom light, morning beauty routine, efficient and quick
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, heavy makeup, dark bathroom, glamorous, inappropriate

scenes.title: Cleaning Glasses
scenes.description: Lucia holds her thin black rectangular glasses under the bathroom faucet, running a thin stream of warm water over the lenses. She places a tiny drop of hand soap on her fingertip and gently rubs each lens in small circles. She rinses them under the water again, then dries them carefully with a soft microfiber cloth from the glasses case. She holds them up to the light, inspecting each lens.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, holding thin black rectangular glasses under bathroom faucet, cleaning lenses with soap and water, small circles on glass, microfiber cloth from glasses case nearby, bright bathroom light, holding glasses up to inspect, careful detailed cleaning, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, wearing glasses, dark bathroom, broken glasses, inappropriate

scenes.title: Writing on Whiteboard
scenes.lighting: bright classroom, overhead fluorescent and window light
scenes.description: Lucia stands at the large whiteboard, a blue marker in her right hand, writing today's date and schedule in neat handwriting. 'Lunes, 10 de febrero' at the top, followed by class periods: Matematicas, Lectura, Recreo, Ciencias, Arte. She caps the blue marker and picks up a red one, underlining the date. The marker tray holds several colors. The whiteboard eraser sits to the side. Her ID badge swings on its lanyard.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman teacher with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, school ID badge on green lanyard, standing at large whiteboard writing date and class schedule with blue marker, neat handwriting, switching to red marker to underline, marker tray with colored markers, whiteboard eraser, bright classroom with fluorescent lights and window light, elementary school, Colombian public school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, child, elderly, no glasses, dark classroom, empty room, high school, inappropriate

scenes.title: Distributing Worksheets
scenes.description: Lucia walks between the rows of student desks, placing a printed worksheet face-down on each desk. The worksheet has multiplication practice problems. She counts the sheets as she distributes them, holding the remaining stack in one hand. Students flip their papers over curiously. Some pick up pencils. One girl raises her hand. Lucia's ID badge and lanyard swing as she walks. Backpacks hang from chair backs in various colors.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman teacher with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, school ID badge on green lanyard, walking between rows of small student desks distributing printed worksheets, holding stack of papers, students in white uniform shirts flipping papers, colorful backpacks on chairs, bright classroom, elementary school, Colombian public school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, empty classroom, no students, dark room, high school, inappropriate

scenes.title: Reading Aloud to Class
scenes.camera_view: Lucia at front holding book open toward class
scenes.description: Lucia stands at the front of the classroom holding the storybook open toward the class so students can see the illustrations. The page shows a bright illustration of a green parrot sitting on a branch. She reads aloud in an animated voice, expression lively. The students are attentive, some leaning forward, all watching the book's pictures. The whiteboard behind her shows the day's schedule with 'Lectura' circled.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman teacher with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, school ID badge, standing at front of classroom holding colorful storybook open toward students showing parrot illustration, animated expression reading aloud, attentive elementary students at small desks, whiteboard with schedule behind her, bright warm classroom light, engaging story time, Colombian elementary school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, empty classroom, bored students, dark room, high school, book closed, inappropriate

scenes.title: Giving Star Stickers
scenes.camera_view: at sticker reward chart on wall
scenes.description: Lucia stands at the sticker reward chart on the wall near the whiteboard. The chart is a large poster with student names listed vertically and columns for each week. She peels star stickers from a sheet -- gold, silver, and red stars -- and places them beside student names. The students watch eagerly, some craning their necks. She announces a student's name and presses a gold star beside it. The student beams from her desk.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman teacher with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, school ID badge, standing at sticker reward chart on classroom wall, peeling gold star sticker from sheet, placing it beside student name on chart, eager students watching from small desks, whiteboard nearby, bright classroom, rewarding participation, elementary school, motivating students
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, empty classroom, dark room, high school, no chart, inappropriate

scenes.title: Showing the Cactus
scenes.camera_view: teacher walking between rows with cactus
scenes.description: Lucia picks up the small potted cactus from her desk and holds it carefully in both hands, walking between the rows so each student can see it up close. The cactus is small and round with tiny spines, planted in a terra cotta pot with dry sandy soil. She says it is a special plant. Students lean in, some reaching tentatively. She warns them gently not to touch the spines. She points to the stem, the soil, the small pot.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 28-year-old Latina woman teacher with light olive skin, dark brown hair in ponytail, thin black rectangular glasses, school ID badge, holding small potted cactus in terra cotta pot carefully in both hands, walking between rows of student desks, students leaning in to see cactus up close, some reaching tentatively, bright classroom, whiteboard with plant diagram in background, science lesson, elementary school, hands-on teaching
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, empty classroom, large cactus, dark room, high school, touching cactus, inappropriate
